Downloaded on 2009-12-14 from:
  http://cksource.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=11&t=15893

Changes to original:
 * Commented out lines 6 & 7, so $aspell_prog variable is not set
 * Commented out line 9, so $lang variable is not set

Both of these are now set by the proxy controller, ckeditor_aspell_plugin_proxy,
according to settings in the 'ckeditor' Kohana config file.
